i think that actually, platform owners need to reevaluate how much it actually matters that they say they're dropping support for something :-) what matters is what people use; not what's supported (altho that might drive the usage)

content.body: over the years I’ve encountered a number of older folks without computer-savvy descendants that have old computers and old browsers and don’t know how to update, and “evergreen” is a lie even if they start with an alleged evergreen browser.
